title: PAYDAY 2 Beta Update Pack + MPfix
description:
This download includes:
PAYDAY Beta update 1
PAYDAY Beta update 2
MPfix

READ THIS!
Assuming you have already installed the main game, open update 1 then start the update. once that is finished move the contents of the crack folder in update 1 to the same folder in which your game is installed. then open update 2 and do the same thing, update, then move the crack contents. finally open the MPfix folder and copy all the files from there, to the place you installed your game.

NOTE!!!
MAKE SURE AS YOU ARE INSTALLING EACH UPDATE THAT IT IS INSTALLING TO THE RIGHT FOLDER, MUST BE THE FOLDER YOUR GAME IS INSTALLED. BY DEFAULT THE UPDATES TRY TO INSTALL TO A DIFFERENT FOLDER THAN THE GAME. SO YOU MUST CHANGE THIS MANUALLY.
more simply... pay attention when installing things.
